actions.committee: Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Agriculture and Forestry.

official_title: A bill to continue the special food service program for children, the school breakfast program, and the special supplemental food program for women, infants, and children through September 30, 1976.

summary.text: Authorizes for the special food service program for children, the school breakfast program, and the special supplemental food program for women, infants, and children under the National School Lunch Act and the Child Nutrition Act through September 30, 1976. Permits States to elect to receive cash payments to purchase agricultural commodities in lieu of donated foods.

titles.title: A bill to continue the special food service program for children, the school breakfast program, and the special supplemental food program for women, infants, and children through September 30, 1976.
